seo.meta_description: Turn your music into living art. AI-powered Spotify Canvas videos that move with your sound. Free. No AI fingerprints.

share_templates.showcase: Just turned my track into a cinematic canvas with @LoopCanvas 🎬
share_templates.artist_spotlight: Artist spotlight: {artist} used LoopCanvas to create a {director}-style canvas for "{track}"
share_templates.before_after: Before: static album art. After: living, breathing visual that moves with the music.

community.discord_welcome: Welcome to LoopCanvas! Drop your track and let's turn it into living art.
twitter_reply_templates: Your music deserves visuals that breathe with it. Try LoopCanvas — it's free.
